subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Check out the NDE videos inside
author: black bear hollow
full_text:
If you click on the link, you will find, aside from info and articles  
on EVP, 6 videos put out by the BBC. If you aren't interested in  
seeing them, simply hit delete.

w.
